T02D1217:325a-1: shr'i ratna manydza r'in'a ma t'i ka /
T02D1217:325a-3: dpal rin po che snye ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1217:325a-4: dpal chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1217:325a-5: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bye brag / gang zhig 'di skad bdag sogs don //
T02D1217:325a-6: dpal rin rdor zhabs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1217:325a-7: shes rab dpal bdag des gsal bshad ;
T02D1217:325a-8: /'di ltar gsang ba chen po ni //
T02D1217:325a-9: gsal bar byed pa lugs min yang //
T02D1217:325a-10: de lta mod kyi bod yul du //
T02D1217:325a-11: skyes pa rang gi slob ma mchog / gus pas zhus pa'i ngor byas so //
T02D1217:325a-12: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
T02D1217:325a-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1217:325a-14: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dpa' bo chen
T02D1217:325a-15: po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas rnam par bskor
T02D1217:325a-16: nas shes rab kyi bha ga la bzhugs so zhes
T02D1217:325a-18: de las dang po brjod pa brjod par bya ba dang 'brel ba dang /
T02D1217:325a-20: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'i don gyi yan lag 'jug pa'i phun sum tshogs pa nges par bshad pa'o //
T02D1217:325a-21: gang gi phyir zhe na 'dis rgyud kyi don gsal bar shes pa de'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:325a-22: dang po ni bdag po phun sum tshogs pa /
T02D1217:325a-23: bdag po ni thams cad skye ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D1217:325a-25: gnyis pa gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni sa bon la yang bzhi dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:325a-26: gsum pa 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni bzhi la yang chu la sogs pa dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:325a-27: bzhi pa dus phun sum tshogs pa ni chu la sogs pa la yang gnas dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:325a-28: lnga pa sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa gnas
T02D1217:325a-29: skabs la yang byed pa po dgos pa'i phyir ro
T02D1217:325a-30: // drug pa rgyud phun sum tshogs pa 'dir byed
T02D1217:325a-31: pa po yang thams cad rdzogs pa la 'dus pa
T02D1217:325a-33: 'di ltar rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1217:325a-34: de la brjod pa la sogs pa'i don gyi rim pas rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1217:325b-0: de'i phyir @325b bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D1217:325b-1: nyid kyi rgyud dpal ye shes thig le rgyud kyi
T02D1217:325b-2: rgyal po las nyid mchog gi dbang phyug gis de
T02D1217:325b-3: skad gsungs so // da ni brjod pa la sogs
T02D1217:325b-4: pa'i don gyis phun sum tshogs pa drug bshad de
T02D1217:325b-5: skad gsungs so // / gang rgyud phun sum tshogs pa de ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1217:325b-6: gang sdud pa po dang dus phun sum tshogs pa gnyis ni brjod par bya'o //
T02D1217:325b-7: gang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'brel pa'o //
T02D1217:325b-8: gang gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1217:325b-9: gang bdag po phun sum tshogs pa de ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1217:325b-10: da ni 'di la ji lta bar sgra'i rim pa gsal bar bshad de /
T02D1217:325b-11: 'di skad ces bya ba ni rgyud de /
T02D1217:325b-12: bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'o //
T02D1217:325b-13: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus so //
T02D1217:325b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1217:325b-15: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D1217:325b-16: ni bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02D1217:325b-17: dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas
T02D1217:325b-18: yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ro
T02D1217:325b-19: // shes rab kyi bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba ni gnas so //
T02D1217:325b-20: da ni ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi la
T02D1217:325b-21: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rim pas
T02D1217:325b-22: don bshad de / rnal 'byor ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1217:325b-23: rnal 'byor ma ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1217:325b-24: de bas na rnal 'byor ni dang por bshad par rigs so //
T02D1217:325b-25: ae'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
T02D1217:325b-26: sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod kyi rten gyi gzugs so //
T02D1217:325b-27: rtsub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sra ba'o //
T02D1217:325b-28: wam gyi rnam pa ni chu'o //
T02D1217:325b-29: gzhan min ni sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod do //
T02D1217:325b-30: gsher ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir 'jam pa'o //
T02D1217:325b-31: ma zhes bya ba ni me'o //
T02D1217:325b-32: nyid byang chub kyi sems rin po che'o //
T02D1217:325b-33: tsha ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir shin tu 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1217:325b-34: ya'i rnam pa ni rlung ngo //
T02D1217:325b-35: yang dag pa byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i gzugs so //
T02D1217:325b-36: g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sprin dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:325b-37: da ni 'byung ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi yi
T02D1217:325b-38: ge bzhi la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i lha mo'i
T02D1217:325b-39: dbang bshad de / ae'i rnam pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02D1217:325b-40: thams cad bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu sbyor thabs byed pa'o //
T02D1217:326a-1: rnam pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D1217:326a-2: sbyor thabs las byung ba'i bde ba phyi'i 'dod chags kyi me'i tsha ba las bsil bar byed pa'o //
T02D1217:326a-3: yang na nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D1217:326a-4: me'i rnam pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gos dkar mo'o //
T02D1217:326a-5: dga' ba dang skad cig thams cad kun myong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:326a-6: y'a'i rnam pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin sgrol ma'o //
T02D1217:326a-7: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rmad du byung
T02D1217:326a-8: ba'i bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa'i phyir
T02D1217:326a-9: ro // yang na khyab par byed pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1217:326a-10: da ni de rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi rim pa bshad de /
T02D1217:326a-11: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'o //
T02D1217:326a-12: yang na tshangs pa'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1217:326a-13: spyod pa'i phyir na gnas so //
T02D1217:326a-14: des na tshangs pa'i gnas so //
T02D1217:326a-15: de la gnas ni sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bzhi'o //
T02D1217:326a-17: gang zhig ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi po
T02D1217:326a-18: de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin lha
T02D1217:326a-19: mo'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis sprul pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1217:326a-21: de yang lha'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1217:326a-22: steng 'og sbyor bas zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1217:326a-23: 'og gi gnas na yod pa ae'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab bo /
T02D1217:326a-24: steng gi gnas na yod pa'i wam gyi rnam pa'i gzugs thabs so //
T02D1217:326a-25: dgongs pa gang gis steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba de bshad de /
T02D1217:326a-26: rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir zhes dgos pa'o //
T02D1217:326a-27: gang gi tshe ae'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab rten
T02D1217:326a-28: yod pa de'i tshe thabs la ngal so'i gnas yod
T02D1217:326a-29: do // thabs ngal so bas thabs bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1217:326a-30: bskyed pa la ni rdzogs pa yang dag par shes so //
T02D1217:326a-31: de lta ma yin na gzhan gang nas 'ong /
T02D1217:326a-33: rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nam mkha' bzhin du chos kyi sku'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1217:326a-34: de ni skyed pa'i rten med pas mi shes so //
T02D1217:326a-35: ji ltar mun nag nang du mar me med par
T02D1217:326a-36: mu tig la sogs pa mi rnyed ces 'brel pa'o
T02D1217:326b-0: // da ni @326b ma'i sgra'i don bshad de /
T02D1217:326b-1: ma y'a zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1217:326b-2: ma'i rnam pa'i bde ba chen po'i grub pa 'od kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1217:326b-3: y'a'i rnam pa ni rang bzhin gyi rlung gi mtshan
T02D1217:326b-4: nyid des mnan pa g-yo ba med par byas pa
T02D1217:326b-6: g-yo ba med pas thams cad dga' ba skad cig
T02D1217:326b-7: ros yongs su rgyas pa de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1217:326b-8: pa'i sku'o // yang na dngos po thams cad kyi
T02D1217:326b-9: ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1217:326b-10: pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:326b-11: yang na ma'i rnam pa ni srog / y'a'i rnam
T02D1217:326b-12: pa ni nye ba'i srog / de dag sbyor bas
T02D1217:326b-13: mnyam pa'o // gang zhig mnyam pa de ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D1217:326b-14: gang zhig srog de ni sum cu rtsa gnyis phyi
T02D1217:326b-15: nang chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dbyu gu drug
T02D1217:326b-16: cu rtsa bzhi thun tshod brgyad kyi phyed kyi bar
T02D1217:326b-17: du brgyad brgyas lhag pa'i stong phrag bcu snang ba
T02D1217:326b-18: mched pa'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i longs spyod
T02D1217:326b-19: myong ba'i don du snying ga nas 'ongs nas khyad
T02D1217:326b-20: par 'byung ngo // phyed kyi snang ba thob pa'i
T02D1217:326b-21: gzugs kyis lte ba'i dbus nas 'ongs nas gyen du
T02D1217:326b-23: bas gang zhig skad cig gis bde ba chen po
T02D1217:326b-24: chu skyes kyi snying por 'od rab chen po'i snang
T02D1217:326b-25: ba de ni ma y'a zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1217:326b-26: par 'byung ngo // 'byung ngo // // da ni thos pa'i sgra'i don bshad de /
T02D1217:326b-27: thos pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1217:326b-29: gang las rdzogs pa de nyid don bshad de /
T02D1217:326b-30: bde ba chen po grub pa'i 'od kyi bdag nyid
T02D1217:326b-31: gang gi tshe grub pa zla ba'i rnam pas yongs
T02D1217:326b-32: su smin pa de'i tshe yongs su smin pa'i dus
T02D1217:326b-33: su rlung dang me'i khong du chud pas mtshan dang
T02D1217:326b-34: dpe byad ldan pa'i sku chu las nya bzhin bzhengs
T02D1217:326b-35: par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:326b-36: yang na thos pa de ni gzhan min rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1217:326b-37: ci zhig de rang don bshad de /
T02D1217:326b-38: dngos po thams cad la snang ba thob pa'o //
T02D1217:326b-39: snang ba zhes bya ba ni tha mar grol ba'i lta ba'o //
T02D1217:326b-40: thob pa ni de rang len pa /
T02D1217:326b-41: yang na gzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:326b-42: da ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya
T02D1217:326b-43: ba'i tshigs bcad la sbyor ba drug gi don gyis
T02D1217:326b-44: ji ltar rang bzhin bshad de /
T02D1217:326b-45: ae'i rnam pa dngos po'i rnam par shes pa dngos po thams cad kyi rten gyi phyir ro //
T02D1217:327a-2: wam gyi rnam pa rten gyi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-3: thob pa dang ma thob pa rnams la ngal so ba'i sa'o //
T02D1217:327a-5: rgyu 'dir rnyed pa la 'byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:327a-6: ma'i rnam pa ni ye shes kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-7: thob pa'i bde ba la sogs pa skyabs sbyin no //
T02D1217:327a-9: ya'i rnam pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-10: sbas pa la bye brag byed do //
T02D1217:327a-11: yang na 'gro bar 'dod pa ni mi ster ba'o //
T02D1217:327a-12: shro'i rnam pa ni mtha'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-13: grangs med pa'i 'jig rten la yod pa'i srog gi grags pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-14: yang na khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-15: de'i rnam pa ni snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-16: mi gsal ba'i bde ba'i ye shes kun la gsal bar byed do //
T02D1217:327a-17: yang na spong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:327a-18: da ni dus gcig na zhes pa'i don bshad de /
T02D1217:327a-19: dus kyi sgra ni gnas skabs so //
T02D1217:327a-20: yang na yongs su smin pa'i dus so //
T02D1217:327a-21: de yang 'dir gnyis su dbye na ni shin tu dus dang /
T02D1217:327a-23: shin tu dus ni sna'i 'phar ba gnyis kyi 'ong ba /
T02D1217:327a-24: ngan dus ni de bzhin du 'gro ba shin tu
T02D1217:327a-25: dus kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do
T02D1217:327a-26: // ngan pa'i dus kyis mi rnyed do //
T02D1217:327a-27: yang na dus ni dga' ba gnyis mnyam par 'byung ngo //
T02D1217:327a-28: yang na gnyis kyi rin po che kha sprad pa'o //
T02D1217:327a-29: yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis rin po che'i ske'i nang gi lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung ba'o //
T02D1217:327a-30: de nyid gzung ba tsam gyis ni gang zhig zla
T02D1217:327a-31: ba nyi ma'i stan 'dzums pa de ni gcig ces
T02D1217:327a-33: yang na gang zhig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba de ni gcig go //
T02D1217:327a-34: yang na gang zhig grags pa dang bral ba de ni gcig go //
T02D1217:327a-35: yang na gang zhig chags pa dang bral ba de
T02D1217:327a-36: dag gcig tu gyur pa mar gyi nang du mar
T02D1217:327a-37: bzhin du de ni dus gcig brjod ces bya ba'i
T02D1217:327a-38: don to // de'i skad cig la phyis bshad pa'i
T02D1217:327a-39: shes rab kyi bha ga la bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1217:327a-40: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D1217:327a-42: chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dra ba bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1217:327a-43: yang na dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1217:327a-44: yang na srid pa'i mun nag bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1217:327b-0: yang na srid pa'i rgya mtsho @327b gting ring ba'i
T02D1217:327b-1: zab pa chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i
T02D1217:327b-2: chu srin gyis khyab pa sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir
T02D1217:327b-3: bcom ldan 'das / yang na stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1217:327b-4: bha ga la bzhugs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so
T02D1217:327b-5: bcom ldan 'das / // bzhugs bzhin du gang gi
T02D1217:327b-6: phyir 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba dbyer med pas
T02D1217:327b-7: gzigs pa de'i phyir thams cad do //
T02D1217:327b-8: ji ltar sus kyang ma gshegs pa de ltar gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1217:327b-9: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras rnam par snang
T02D1217:327b-10: mdzad la sogs pa de rnams kyi gang zhig sku
T02D1217:327b-11: gsung thugs de ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1217:327b-12: rdo rje ni rang bzhin bde ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1217:327b-13: bde ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir mi shigs pa'o //
T02D1217:327b-14: yang na thams cad kyi sgras 'byung ba chen po
T02D1217:327b-15: las skyes pa phung po la sogs de ni ji
T02D1217:327b-16: ltar sngon 'ongs pa de bzhin du 'gro ba de
T02D1217:327b-17: ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1217:327b-18: // de rnams la gang zhig sku de ni sku'i mtshan nyid kyis 'das so //
T02D1217:327b-19: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas skyon mi bgyid pa'i phyir
T02D1217:327b-20: lus po la rgas pa la sogs pa yod pa'o
T02D1217:327b-21: // de med pas lus po yod pa ni yang med de /
T02D1217:327b-22: ji ltar chu'i zla ba bzhin du chu zla'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir de nyid rdo rje'o //
T02D1217:327b-23: de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1217:327b-24: chos rnams kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings bya ba chos kyi sgra ni sku gsung thugs /
T02D1217:327b-25: dbyings kyi sgra ni sa bon sems las byung ba /
T02D1217:327b-27: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol phyin ma /
T02D1217:327b-28: de'i bha ga ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D1217:327b-29: de yang shin tu gting ring ba zab pa tshad med bsam du med do //
T02D1217:327b-30: yang na mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dzin pa'i gzhi bcom pa'i phyir bha ga'o //
T02D1217:327b-31: de la bzhugs pa su zhig bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1217:327b-32: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D1217:327b-33: thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D1217:327b-34: da ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs
T02D1217:327b-35: pa nas bzhugs pa yan chad gnas dang nye ba'i
T02D1217:327b-36: gnas la sogs pa'i don gyis ji lta ba'i rang
T02D1217:327b-37: bzhin bshad de gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D1217:327b-38: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la
T02D1217:327b-39: ae wam gyi rnam pa gnas pa de'i phyir gnas
T02D1217:327b-40: dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i don gyis nges
T02D1217:327b-42: zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga la sogs pa nas sems can gyi phyogs la snying rje med /
T02D1217:328a-0: @328a * // yod na 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa ci'i don gyi phyir yang dag par ma bshad /
T02D1217:328a-1: gang zhig bshad pa de ni rgyud rang gi rim
T02D1217:328a-2: pa bor nas gal te 'dus pa la gnas la
T02D1217:328a-3: sogs pa'i don ma bshad ces dgongs nas de la
T02D1217:328a-4: smra'o // gang 'dus pa ma bshad na de ni
T02D1217:328a-5: 'dus pa chen po la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma
T02D1217:328a-6: smra'o // bshad dam ci / gal te rgyud mthong
T02D1217:328a-7: ba yin na de lta yin na thos pa che
T02D1217:328a-9: thos pa chung ba des 'grel pa la sogs pa mi bya /
T02D1217:328a-10: mang po smra bas ci bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
T02D1217:328a-11: pa'i go rims kyis bdag gi der don bshad de
T02D1217:328a-12: / 'di skad ces bya ba'i gnas dngos po thams cad kyi rten gyi phyir /
T02D1217:328a-13: yang na 'ongs pa rnams la gnas bgyid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-14: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i gnas /
T02D1217:328a-15: gnas pa la 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir yang na yongs su smin par byed pas so //
T02D1217:328a-16: thos zhes bya ba ni zhing thams cad skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir yang na rdzogs par byed pas so //
T02D1217:328a-17: dus gcig ces pa ni nye ba'i zhing thams cad
T02D1217:328a-18: la thams cad yan lag gis thams cad rgyas par
T02D1217:328a-19: byed pa'i phyir / yang na khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa ni 'dun pa /
T02D1217:328a-21: rten dang 'phel ba dang 'byung ba dang yan lag rgyas pa la gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D1217:328a-22: yang na lta ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-24: bzung ba'i dngos po la 'du byed bgyid pa'i phyir yang na dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-26: chos thams cad la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir yang na bye brag gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-28: dngos po thams cad la nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328a-29: ji ltar padma'i 'dab ma ni nang na chu /
T02D1217:328a-30: yang na thams cad kyi nang na yod pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328a-31: ji ltar shing la sogs pa'i nang na me'o //
T02D1217:328a-32: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni dur khrod /
T02D1217:328a-33: dngos po thams cad la dngos po med par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328a-34: yang na rlag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-35: dpa' bo chen po zhes pa ni nye ba'i dur khrod /
T02D1217:328a-36: brlag pa 'grub pa la sngon gyi bag chags kyi
T02D1217:328a-37: stobs kyis gzhan ma'i dngos pos myu gu 'byung bar
T02D1217:328a-38: byed pa'i phyir / yang na rang gi mtshan nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328a-39: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma ni ring ba chos thams
T02D1217:328a-40: cad la ye shes kyi lta bas khyab par byed
T02D1217:328a-41: pa'i phyir / yang na khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328b-0: @328b yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i ring ba /
T02D1217:328b-1: ye shes kyi lta bas khyab pa'i dngos po la yang dag par dran par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328b-2: yang na nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328b-3: shes rab ces bya ba ni sbyor ba /
T02D1217:328b-4: ye shes thams cad las gzhan ma yin pa spyod pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328b-5: yang na rnam par dpyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328b-6: bha ga zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i sbyor ba /
T02D1217:328b-7: rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes la yang dag par mtshan nyid mi dmigs par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328b-8: yang na btang snyoms byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328b-9: bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni lam /
T02D1217:328b-10: chos thams cad la 'gog pa grol ba'i phyir /
T02D1217:328b-11: yang na dag par byed pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1217:328b-12: / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i lam /
T02D1217:328b-13: skad cig gcig gis bcu bzhi dbang byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328b-14: yang na rnyed pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1217:328b-15: da ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi go rims kyi don bshad de /
T02D1217:328b-16: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:328b-19: shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas ye shes chen po thob bo //
T02D1217:328b-20: ae'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni char yang thams cad bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328b-21: gleng gzhi'i rang bzhin ye shes kyi gzugs so //
T02D1217:328b-22: wam gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni thig le bde ba la tshim par byed pa'i phyir ;
T02D1217:328b-23: 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ye shes kyi gzugs so //
T02D1217:328b-24: ma'i rnam pa zhes bya ba tshul /
T02D1217:328b-25: bde ba la yangs par byed pa'i phyir gnas kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1217:328b-26: y'a'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni tshul tsam bde
T02D1217:328b-27: ba la nang gi reg bya byed pa'i phyir stong
T02D1217:328b-28: pa nyid ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1217:328b-29: de ltar rang bzhin ye shes gzhi'i bye brag tu
T02D1217:328b-30: 'di skad bdag gi don dpal de kho na nyid
T02D1217:328b-31: kyi sgron ma'i rgyud kyi 'di ru zhes bstan to
T02D1217:328b-32: // da ni ye shes bzhi la rtsa'i don gyis rang gi ngo bor bshad de /
T02D1217:328b-34: da ltar yod pa dga' ba rnams la gnas sbyin pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:328b-35: yang na rtsa ni thams cad la rtsa ba'i rten la gnas /
T02D1217:328b-36: rtsa ba'i rten gnas las bde ba thams cad la sogs pa rnyed do //
T02D1217:328b-37: ae'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni lus kyi mtshan nyid srog ma /
T02D1217:328b-38: lus gsal ba'i gzugs kyi phyir ngag la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1217:328b-39: wam gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni ngag gi mtshan nyid ro ma /
T02D1217:329a-0: ngag ni ro thams cad kyi dbang @329a * //
T02D1217:329a-1: byed pa mi gsal na yang gsal ba'i snang ba byed do //
T02D1217:329a-2: ma'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin 'dzin ma /
T02D1217:329a-3: bde ba thams cad dang ro las 'byung ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa'i phyir /
T02D1217:329a-4: yang na tshor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:329a-5: y'a'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems las byung
T02D1217:329a-6: ba'i ngo bo nyid rtog med ma gsal ba rten
T02D1217:329a-7: la sogs pa ni khyad par bye brag ngo bo
T02D1217:329a-8: zhes pas / yang na spros pa dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1217:329a-9: da ni rtsa'i mtshan nyid can yi ge bzhi la gnas bshad de /
T02D1217:329a-10: ae'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1217:329a-11: pa'i nang du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1217:329a-12: can 'dab ma gsum pa'i 'dab skyes so //
T02D1217:329a-13: wam gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni de'i nang
T02D1217:329a-14: na yod pa rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1217:329a-15: lte ba / ma'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1217:329a-16: lte ba'i nang na yod pa rnam par 'joms pa'i
T02D1217:329a-17: mtshan nyid can sgur mo'i rnam pa'i bya gdong ma
T02D1217:329a-18: lte ba / gtum mo'o // y'a'i rnam pa zhes
T02D1217:329a-19: bya ba ni rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can yon po'i
T02D1217:329a-20: gdub bu'i rnam pa aanydza ka'o //
T02D1217:329a-22: gnas gsum gyi dbus su gang zhig yon po'i gdub
T02D1217:329a-23: bu'i rnam pa aanydza ka de ni kun rdzob dang
T02D1217:329a-24: / don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1217:329a-25: da ni dga' ba bcu drug gi bye brag tu
T02D1217:329a-26: thos pa la sogs pa'i don gsal bar bshad de
T02D1217:329a-27: / gang gi phyir ae wam zhes bya ba ni
T02D1217:329a-28: bde ba'i zhing de bdag gis thos zhes bya ba
T02D1217:329a-29: / ni 'brel pa / de'i phyir ji ltar thos
T02D1217:329a-30: pa la sogs pa'i don dga' ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1217:329a-31: don gyis gsal bar byed pa de ni rgyu 'bras
T02D1217:329a-33: thos pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid zla ba'i bde ba /
T02D1217:329a-34: bde ba la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:329a-35: gcig ces bya ba ni 'dar ba'i grags pa mchog
T02D1217:329a-36: sbyor ba tsam gyis ni steng gnas na yod pa'i
T02D1217:329a-37: byang chub kyi sems 'og nas 'gro ba'i rab g-yo
T02D1217:329a-38: ba'i phyir ro // dus zhes bya ba ni 'gro
T02D1217:329a-39: ba'i rang gi ngo bo phyag rgya chen po rang
T02D1217:329a-40: gi gnas reg bya nyams su myong ba'i dus shes
T02D1217:329a-41: nas phyi nas gyen du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:329a-42: phyag rgya chen po'i sgra ni rtog med ma bdag gis dgongs pa'o //
T02D1217:329a-43: thams cad ces bya ba ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1217:329a-44: ye shes gsum gcig pu yin na yang rlag pa
T02D1217:329a-45: longs spyod dbang byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:329b-0: de bzhin @329b gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas
T02D1217:329b-1: pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa dbang la
T02D1217:329b-2: sogs pa byed pas skad cig dang /
T02D1217:329b-3: ro la sogs pa khengs pa las chad pa la rnam par 'byed pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:329b-4: sku zhes bya ba ni mdung gi ngo bo nyid dga' ba las kyi phyag rgya las 'byung /
T02D1217:329b-5: bde bar rang gis dpyod pa'i stobs kyis yongs su
T02D1217:329b-6: por bas mtshan nyid med par byed pa'i phyir zhes
T02D1217:329b-8: gsung zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba'i grags pa mchog
T02D1217:329b-9: gi dga' ba dam tshig phyag rgya las 'byung ba'i
T02D1217:329b-10: bde ba myong nas bcos ma zhes yongs su bsgoms
T02D1217:329b-11: te / dpe med gsar du 'byung ba'i bde ba byed pas so //
T02D1217:329b-12: sems zhes bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo
T02D1217:329b-13: bo nyid chad pa'i ngo bo de ru smra ba
T02D1217:329b-14: mang po yod / man ngag gi phyir smra ba
T02D1217:329b-15: lugs ma yin na yang de lta mod kyi skal
T02D1217:329b-16: ldan sems can gyi ngor mdzad pas bstan bcos kyi
T02D1217:329b-17: gzhi la bdag gis bri zhes 'brel pa'o //
T02D1217:329b-18: mchog gi dga' ba 'di med na de la ji
T02D1217:329b-19: ltar chad pa'i dga' ba las rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1217:329b-20: rnyed de / chad pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba
T02D1217:329b-21: ni dga' ba'i dngos po las rlag pa srog dang
T02D1217:329b-23: ji ltar snum zad pa'i mar me'i sdong bu de
T02D1217:329b-24: ni 'dod pa'i dngos po rnyed pa yun ring po
T02D1217:329b-25: yod dam ci / chad pa'i dga' ba yang de bzhin no //
T02D1217:329b-26: med pas na gcig pu chad pa'i mun nag go //
T02D1217:329b-27: mun nag la shin tu phra mo'i dngos po sus rnyed par nus /
T02D1217:329b-28: de bas na mchog gi dga' ba'i mar me dgos so //
T02D1217:329b-29: gang gi phra mo'i dngos po rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed pa zhes bdag gis dgos pa'o //
T02D1217:329b-30: ji ltar rnyed pa'i man ngag gi don bdag gis bshad de /
T02D1217:329b-31: dang po srub dang bsrub thabs kyi gtum mo'i sbyor
T02D1217:329b-32: ba las rdo rje rtsa bar dga' ba tshor bar
T02D1217:329b-33: bya'o // rtsa ba las rke ru mchog gi dga'
T02D1217:329b-34: ba rke las snying gar chad pa'i dga' ba de
T02D1217:329b-35: ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1217:329b-36: rdzogs pa'i phyogs su snying ga'i gnas su bde ba
T02D1217:329b-37: chen po sleb pa tsam gyis bla ma'i man ngag
T02D1217:329b-38: las de ru gang zhig gzung ba de ni mchog
T02D1217:329b-39: tu dga' ba'o // cung zad tsam gyen du 'gro bar byed pa rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1217:329b-40: de ltar min na rang bzhin dga' ba thob par mi 'gyur zhes bdag gis dgongs so //
T02D1217:330a-1: bya ba rdo rje 'bar ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1217:330a-2: rang bzhin spros pa thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1217:330a-3: phyag dang mdog la sogs pa bral ba'i 'od kyi
T02D1217:330a-5: dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo
T02D1217:330a-6: chen po byang chub kyi sems thig le'i ngo bo
T02D1217:330a-7: nyid du zhu ba dang chad pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1217:330a-8: phyir thig le'i sgras bshad pa'o //
T02D1217:330a-9: dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug ma ni myos pa'i rang bzhin gtso //
T02D1217:330a-10: bde ba thams cad la sogs pa khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:330a-11: yongs su bskor ba zhes pa ni chad pa'i dga'
T02D1217:330a-12: ba'i mtshan nyid kyi yan lag thams cad chad pa
T02D1217:330a-15: chad pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dga' ba ni nyin
T02D1217:330a-16: mo'i mtshan nyid mtshan mo 'das pas nyin mor 'gyur
T02D1217:330a-17: ro // nyin mo'i yan lag thams cad 'od dang
T02D1217:330a-18: ldan pa mchog gi dga' ba mthong ba mdzes pa
T02D1217:330a-20: sa zhes bya ba ni shes rab aom dha'i rang
T02D1217:330a-21: bzhin sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod ro thams cad
T02D1217:330a-22: dang / reg bya la sogs pa la gzhi'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:330a-23: yang na ngal so ba zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
T02D1217:330a-24: bha ga zhes bya ba ni tshul gyi ngo bo
T02D1217:330a-25: nyid longs spyod tha ma'i dngos po bcom pa'i phyir
T02D1217:330a-26: / yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ro myong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:330a-27: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bzhugs so //
T02D1217:330a-28: phyi'i chags pa la sogs pa ma tshor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1217:330a-29: ji ltar skyes bu gnyid du 'gro ba ci yang mi tshor ro //
T02D1217:330a-30: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1217:330a-31: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1217:330a-32: yang na thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1217:330a-33: de ni mchog gi gsang chen po //
T02D1217:330a-34: thams cad rgyud kyi don snying po //
T02D1217:330a-35: mchog gi bla ma mngon par gces //
T02D1217:330a-36: ye shes bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'o //
T02D1217:330a-37: dri med bdag gis bshad pa yis //
T02D1217:330a-38: gang zhig 'bras mchog dge ba rnyed //
T02D1217:330a-39: srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa la //
T02D1217:330a-40: de yis grol bar 'gro bar shog / bdag nyid dran pa'i don phyir dang //
T02D1217:330a-41: mkhas pa ya mtshan 'gyur ba dang //
T02D1217:330a-42: slob ma dga' ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1217:330a-43: bdag gis rin chen snye ma byas //
T02D1217:330a-44: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shr'i gupta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
T02D1217:330a-45: dpal rin po che'i snye ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
